trans-unit.source: Collects the characteristics associated with table layouts.
trans-unit.target: 收集与表布局相关联的特性。

trans-unit.source: The TableLayoutSettings class collects and manages the characteristics associated with the table layout scheme.
trans-unit.target: TableLayoutSettings 类收集和管理与表布局方案相关联的特性。

trans-unit.source: This class is used internally by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> classes, as well as the table layout engine.
trans-unit.target: 内部使用此类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>类，以及表布局引擎。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: The TableLayoutSettings class is used by the layout engine to determine how to lay out the container's child controls.
trans-unit.target: TableLayoutSettings 类由布局引擎用于确定如何设置布局容器的子控件。

trans-unit.source: The TableLayoutSettings class manages the following information: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle> being used.
trans-unit.target: TableLayoutSettings 类所管理的以下信息:-<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle>正在使用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle>

trans-unit.source: - The maximum number of columns and rows in the layout.
trans-unit.target: -最大数量的列和行布局中。

trans-unit.source: - The collection of styles used for the contained columns and rows.
trans-unit.target: 的使用包含的列和行样式集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of columns allowed in the table layout.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置最大允许表布局中的列数。

trans-unit.source: Setting the ColumnCount property does not allocate the columns or any backing memory.
trans-unit.target: 设置列数属性不会分配列或预留任何内存。

trans-unit.source: This allocation occurs when the columns are created.
trans-unit.target: 创建列时，会发生此分配操作。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property causes the table to undergo another layout operation.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性将导致该表发生另一个布局操作。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of columns allowed in the table layout.
trans-unit.target: 最大允许表布局中的列数。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: The property value is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 属性值小于 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of styles used to determine the look and feel of the table layout columns.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于确定表布局列的外观和感觉的样式的集合。

trans-unit.source: Use the ColumnStyles property to access the style properties of specific columns.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ColumnStyles 属性访问的样式属性的特定列。

trans-unit.source: The order of the styles in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection?displayProperty=fullName> matches the order of the corresponding columns in the layout table.
trans-unit.target: 中的样式的顺序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection?displayProperty=fullName>匹配布局表中的相应列的顺序。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection"></xref> that contains the column styles for the layout table.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection"> </xref>包含布局表的列样式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition"></xref> that represents the row and the column of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition"></xref>表示的行和单元格的列。

trans-unit.source: A control contained within a cell.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含在单元格中的控件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition"></xref> that represents the cell position.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition"> </xref> ，表示单元格位置。

trans-unit.source: control is .
trans-unit.target: controlis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the column position of the specified child control.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定的子控件的列位置。

trans-unit.source: A control contained within a cell.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含在单元格中的控件。

trans-unit.source: The column position of the specified child control.
trans-unit.target: 指定的子控件的列位置。

trans-unit.source: control is .
trans-unit.target: controlis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of columns that the cell containing the child control spans.
trans-unit.target: 获取单元格包含子控件跨的列数。

trans-unit.source: A control contained within a cell.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含在单元格中的控件。

trans-unit.source: The number of columns that the cell containing the child control spans.
trans-unit.target: 包含子控件的单元格跨的列数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the row position of the specified child control.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定的子控件的行位置。

trans-unit.source: A control contained within a cell.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含在单元格中的控件。

trans-unit.source: The row position of the specified child control.
trans-unit.target: 指定的子控件的行位置。

trans-unit.source: control is .
trans-unit.target: controlis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of rows that the cell containing the child control spans.
trans-unit.target: 获取单元格包含子控件跨的行数。

trans-unit.source: A control contained within a cell.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含在单元格中的控件。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows that the cell containing the child control spans.
trans-unit.target: 包含子控件的单元格跨的行数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how the table layout should expand to accommodate new cells when all existing cells are occupied.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值表布局应该展开以容纳新的单元格时所有的现有单元格都被占用。

trans-unit.source: The GrowStyle property determines how the layout engine should add a new cell to a full table.
trans-unit.target: 标签属性确定如何布局引擎应将新的单元格添加到一个完整的表。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle> to indicate that rows should be added, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle> to indicate that columns should be added, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle> to disallow expansion.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle>以指示是否应添加行，请<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle>以指示是否应添加列，请或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle>禁止扩展。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The property value is not valid for the enumeration type.
trans-unit.target: 属性值不是有效的枚举类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current table layout engine.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前表布局引擎。

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEngine property is typically used in two contexts: - A container that uses a table layout.
trans-unit.target: LayoutEngine 属性一般用于在两个上下文:-使用表布局的容器。

trans-unit.source: - A control contained within a table layout container, such as a button contained in a cell of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 的包含在表布局容器，例如包含的一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>单元格中的按钮控件

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine"></xref> currently being used.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine"> </xref>当前正在使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of rows allowed in the table layout.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置最大表布局中允许的行数。

trans-unit.source: Setting the RowCount property does not allocate the rows or any backing memory.
trans-unit.target: 将行计数属性设置不会分配行或预留任何内存。

trans-unit.source: This allocation occurs when the rows are created.
trans-unit.target: 创建行时，会发生此分配操作。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property causes the table to undergo another layout operation.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性将导致该表发生另一个布局操作。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of rows allowed in the table layout.
trans-unit.target: 最大表布局中允许的行数。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: The property value is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 属性值小于 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of styles used to determine the look and feel of the table layout rows.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于确定表布局行的外观和感觉的样式的集合。

trans-unit.source: Use the RowStyles property to access the style properties of specific rows.
trans-unit.target: 使用 RowStyles 属性访问的样式属性的特定行。

trans-unit.source: The order of the styles in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection?displayProperty=fullName> matches the order of the corresponding rows in the layout table.
trans-unit.target: 中的样式的顺序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection?displayProperty=fullName>匹配布局表中的相应行的顺序。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"></xref> that contains the row styles for the layout table.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"> </xref>包含布局表的行样式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition"></xref> that represents the row and the column of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 集<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition"></xref>表示的行和单元格的列。

trans-unit.source: A control contained within a cell.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含在单元格中的控件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition"></xref> that represents the cell position.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition"> </xref> ，表示单元格位置。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>接口。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings>
